project.name: CEA master project
project.description:
This project provides:

  • CEA application-servers for various kinds of applications;
  • a server class-library and framework for writing new kinds of CEA service;
  • a client class-library for calling CEA services;
  • an integration-test application.

Each part is in a separate sub-project.

The application servers cover command-line applications; external web-applications; applications linked in as Java classes. Each kind of application server is provided as a web application in a WAR. The science applications are not included; they are added when deploying and configuring the application servers. Each application server support the Common Execution Connector (CEC) web-service interface.
